description: Single and two storey rear extension (Demolition of rear extension)
decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>P001 (Proposed Floor Plans), P002 (Proposed Elevations), P003 (Proposed side Elevations), P004 (Proposed section), L01 (Location Plan),&nbsp;&nbsp;Reasonable Exception Statement ( Dated 14.11.24)</p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
